page.title: 14HEALTH.
page.content:
In Ilfracombe there are 3 full-time Doctors and one part-time Doctor. They all work in the Health Centre. A Trainee Doctor comes every 12 months.There are 5 Dentists here but only 1 works by himself.The Health Centre has an Ambulance Station.There is a Hospital called the Tyrell.
People jog in the area.Most people go to the Dentist regularly,but some people only went every 2 years.At school there is a nurse. The mild climate makes it a fairly healthy place to live.However,in the winter, colds are frequent.Doctors see young children and old people more than anyone-else. The nearest large hospital is at Barnstaple.
